(And most of all... I-I’m alone with a g-girl...
Wh-what do I do...?)

Japanese: ねぇ？　ねぇってば！
English: Hey, HEY!

Japanese: うわっ！？
English: Whoa!

Japanese:
んもう
ボーっとしちゃって　どうしたのよ？
English: Sheesh, what’re you daydreaming about?

Japanese:
な　なんでもないよ…！
ちょっと疲れてるだけだから……
English:
N-Nothing!
I’m just tired...

Japanese:
ふーん…
それじゃあ　あたしはシャワー浴びてくるから
あんたは早く寝なさいよね
English:
Well, I’m gonna go take a shower.
You should hurry up and get some rest.

Japanese: シャワー！？
English: A SHOWER!?

Japanese:
な…なによ　大声出して…
もしかして　先に入りたいの？
English:
Why are you shouting all of a sudden...
don’t tell me you want to take a bath first?

Japanese:
あ…ううん　大丈夫
先行ってきていいよ…
English:
Oh... no... I’m fine...
You can go first.

Japanese: ヘンなの
English: Weirdo.

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: {fixed}（うぅ…　絶対眠れないよ…）
English: (I... definitely won’t get to sleep tonight...)

Japanese: ベッドはひとつ
English: Only One Bed

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: イリア
English: Illia

Japanese:
まさか　都会の宿がこんなに混んでるなんて…
ナメてたわ…
English:
Whew... Man, I didn’t expect these
city inns to be so crowded...

Japanese:
でも　一部屋だけ空いててよかったよね
野宿しなくてすむし…
English:
At least we managed to get an open room.
We won’t have to sleep outside...

Japanese:
本当よ～　超ラッキー♪
部屋は狭いけど　結構いいカンジだし悪くないわ
English:
True! We sure lucked out～ Room’s really cramped,
but it’s a nice room so it’s not bad at all.

Japanese:
でもさ…　その…こ…この部屋
ベッドひとつしかないよ…？
English:
But... Th-this room only has
one b-bed though...

Japanese:
じゃあ　あたしは窓際いくから
あんたはこっち
English:
Then I’ll be sleeping by the window,
so you take this side.

Japanese:
え…えぇ…！？
い　一緒に寝るの…？
English:
H-Huh?
We’re both s-sleeping together?

Japanese:
なに言ってんの
一つしかないなら　そうなるでしょ？
English:
What the heck are you talking about!?
There’s only one bed so it has to be that way.

Japanese:
それともなに？
あたしと一緒じゃ　寝られないって言いたいの？
English:
Or else what?
You telling me you don’t want to sleep with me?

Japanese: そ　そんなことはないよ！！
English: N-No! I mean-- I don’t mind!

Japanese:
ただ　お…女の子と一緒にだなんて…
僕　その……
English:
Wh-What I mean is...
I’ll be sleeping with a girl...
I... uhh...

Japanese:
ちょっと　なにしてんの！
眠いんだから　早く明かり消してよね！
ふぁぁぁぁ…
English:
Oh, cut that out.
Look, I’m turning off the light 
now and I’m gonna sleep.

Japanese: あっ　待って…！
English: H-Hey, wait!

Japanese: じゃあ　おやすみ～
English: Well, good night!

Japanese: う　うん　おやすみ……
English: Yeah... G-Good night...

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: {fixed}（うわわわわ！　ち…近い…！！）
English: (She’s... She’s too close...!!)

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese:
{fixed}（ああ……ぼ　僕　どうしよう…
　どうしたら…　うぅ…眠れないよ…）
English:
(Wh-wh-wh-what do I do...?
What should I... I... I can’t sleep...)

Japanese: お隣は？
English: And the Neighbor...?

Japanese: 気弱な男の子
English: Timid Boy

Japanese: 強気な女の子
English: Bullish Girl

Japanese:
やはり実際に見ると　ずいぶん違うね
この世界は　なかなか興味深い
English:
Upon further examination, this world is truly different...
How interesting...

Japanese:
異能者捕縛適応法の施行に
ルカ・ミルダとの出会い…
English:
The enforcement of the Deviant Reformation Act
and the meeting with Ruca Milda...

Japanese:
これから世界は　どんどん加速していく
彼は…いや　彼らはどうなっていくんだろうね
楽しみだ
English:
From this point onwards, the world’s conflicts will
begin escalating. I wonder what he-- they will do in 
response? I can’t wait to find out.

Japanese:
ほら　なにグズグズしてんのよ
急がないと　お店閉まっちゃう
English:
Come on, what are you dawdling about!?
Hurry up, the store’s closing!

Japanese:
ま…待って
そんなに急がなくても　ご飯は逃げないよ
English:
W-Wait! I’m telling you we d-don’t have to hurry,
it’s not like the f-food’s going to g-go anywhere.

Japanese:
材料がなくなるかもしれないでしょ
ほら　早く！
English:
They might run out of ingredients, you know?
Hurry up!

Japanese: わかった　わかったから　引っ張らないでよぉ～
English: Fine, I get it! Stop pulling me!

Japanese:
騒がしいな
それにしても　今の声はどこかで…
いや　気のせいか
English:
How noisy... That said, that voice sounds familiar.
I wonder where...?
Hmm... I’m just imagining it.

Japanese: さて…　ボクもそろそろご飯にしようかな
English: Now, I should get myself some food too.

Japanese: イリアを起こしてみる
English: Waking Illia Up

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: イリア
English: Illia

Japanese: あの…　アニーミさん起きて　朝だよ
English: Umm... Miss Illia? Wake up... it’s morning.

Japanese: うーん……あと５分…
English: Hmm... Five more minutes...

Japanese: ５分後
English: Five minutes later...

Japanese: アニーミさん　５分経ったよ　起きて
English: Miss Illia? It’s been five minutes. Wake up...

Japanese:
うっさいわねぇ…
じゃあ　あと１５分…
English:
You noisy--
Fifteen more minutes!

Japanese: でも　このままだと…
English: But at this rate--

Japanese:
あ～～～もう！　うっさいわね！
あたしは眠いの！　寝かせなさいよね！！
English:
Damn it! You’re too noisy!
Didn’t you see that I was sleeping!?
Can’t you let other people sle--

Japanese: って　起きちゃったじゃない！
English: See!? I’m awake now!

Japanese: ああ　もうバカ～～～！！
English: YOU IDIOT!

Japanese: でも　起きれたんだし　結果オーライかな…？
English:
Well, at least she’s awake now.
So I guess it worked out?

Japanese: 意外と力持ち
English: Unexpectedly Strong

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese:
なぁ　ルカ
ちょっと剣を貸してくれ
English: Hey, Ruca, mind lending me your sword for a bit?

Japanese: スパーダ？　いきなりどうしたの？
English: What’s the matter, Spada?

Japanese:
いや　お前の剣ってでけぇじゃん
どんな感じなのかなって
English:
Nothing much. Just wanted to know
how it feels to hold a big sword.

Japanese:
いいよ
はい　スパーダ
English: Sure. Here you go.

Japanese: おう　悪いな
English: Thanks.

Japanese: って　うぉ！？
English: Ah-- whoa!

Japanese: ス　スパーダ！？
English: S-Spada!?

Japanese:
なんでもねェよ
ちょっと油断しただけだ
English: I’m fine. Was just a bit careless.

Japanese: {fixed}（こいつこんな重い剣を使ってたのか）
English: (This guy’s been using such a heavy sword.)

Japanese: ルカ　この剣重くねェのか？
English: Ruca, isn’t this sword heavy?

Japanese:
え？　う　うん…そうだね
最初は重かったけれど　もう慣れたかな
English:
Hm? Oh y-yeah... It was heavy at the beginning,
but I’ve gotten used to it now.

Japanese:
へぇ…
ほら　ありがとな
English: Oh... Here, thanks.

Japanese: わ　わわっ！？
English: Wh-whoa!?

Japanese: {fixed}（…意外と力持ちなんだな）
English: (This guy’s surprisingly strong...)

Japanese: よォし　オレも負けてらんねェぜ！
English: I won’t lose too!

Japanese: 夜の語らい
English: Nighttime Chat

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: イリア
English: Illia

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese: それじゃあ　スパーダ　おやすみ
English: Well, Spada, good night.

Japanese:
おーっと　ルカ！
なに先に一人で寝ようとしてんだ？
夜はこれからじゃねェか！　そうだろ？
English:
Hold on, Ruca!
What do you think you’re doing
trying to sleep before I do?

Japanese: なに？　どうしたのスパーダ
English: Huh? Why...?

Japanese: なぁ　ルカ　今ここには誰がいる？
English: Is there anyone else here, right now?

Japanese: スパーダと僕だけど…それがどうかしたの？
English: No, only you and me...

Japanese:
そう　ここにはオレらしかいねェ
そして今は夜だ
定番のアノ話をしようじゃないか！
English:
Right, we’re the only ones here and it’s nighttime too!
We have to talk about that!

Japanese: あの話…？
English: Talk about what?

Japanese:
おいおい　トボケなくてもいいんだぜ
アノ話といったら　アレしかねぇだろ？
English:
Hey, man, no need to play dumb with me.
The only thing we can talk about now is “that!”

Japanese: アレ…？
English: “That?”

Japanese: ホントにわかってねェのか
English:
Wait, you really don’t know?
Tch... Sheesh, you’re so slow...

Japanese: カーッ…！　鈍いな…　仕方ねェ　耳貸せ
English: Can’t be helped, come here.

Japanese: ゴニョゴニョ　ゴニョゴニョ…
English: whisper whisper...

Japanese:
うわわわ…！
ぼ　ぼぼぼ僕は別にそんな…！
い　い　一切そんなことは…！！
English:
WH-WH-WH-WHOA! NO I-I’M NOT--!
I- I- I-I’VE NEVER...!!

Japanese:
おいおい　ルカ　顔　真っ赤だぜ
ヒャッハッハッハッハ！！
English: Hahaha, your face has gotten all red!

Japanese: で　どうなんだ？
English: So, what do you think?

Japanese:
そ　そそんなこと　経験したことないし……
き…聞かれても　こここ…困るよ…！
English:
I-I-I’ve never d-done it in the first place...
And even... even if you asked me...!
I... I don’t know!

Japanese:
ンだよ　勿体ぶってねェで　言っちまえよ
おらおら　ヒャハハハハ！
English:
Dude, don’t be such a goody two-shoes!
C’mon, spill! Hahahaha!

Japanese: うっるさ～～～
English: SHUT. THE. HELL.
UP!!

Japanese:
あんたたち　今何時だと思ってんの！？
うるさくて眠れないじゃない！
ふざけんのも大概にしなさいよね！
English:
DO YOU BOTH KNOW WHAT TIME IT IS!?
CAN’T YOU BOTH JUST SHUT UP?
I’M TRYING TO SLEEP HERE!

Japanese:
いい？　次　騒いだら　問答無用で
外にたたき出すからね！　フンっ！！
English:
IF YOU MAKE ONE. MORE. SOUND.
I’LL MAKE YOU BOTH SLEEP OUTSIDE, MYSELF!
HMPH!

Japanese: …………寝るか
English: Let’s go to bed...

Japanese: ……うん…
English: Yeah...

Japanese: レッツ！　枕投げ
English: Let’s Pillow Fight!

Japanese: マクラ
English: Pillow

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: イリア
English: Illia

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese: コーダ
English: Coda

Japanese: マクラ
English: Pillow

Japanese: なんとか部屋が取れて　良かったね
English: Phew... I somehow managed to get a room...

Japanese: でも　イリア　３人部屋でごめん…
English: It’s only for three people though...

Japanese:
なに言ってんのよ
野宿するよりかは全然マシ
ゆっくり寝られるし　ご飯も出るし
English:
What the heck are you saying?
This is way better than camping outside!
We can sleep and eat plenty!

Japanese:
体中が痛くなることもないしな
さてと　そろそろ寝る準備しちまおうぜ
English:
Damn right, no back aches too.
Welp, let’s get ready for bed.

Japanese:
うん
イリアは窓際のベッドでいい？
English:
Okay.
You’re taking the bed by the window right, Illia?

Japanese:
もっちろん
さすがルカ　わかってる～♪
English:
Of course I am, Ruca!
You sure know me well.

Japanese:
えへへ…
じゃあ　僕は入口側で寝るね
English: Haha... then, I’ll take the side near the entrance.

Japanese: ねぇ～　スパーダ　ちょっと…
English: Hey, Spada～

Japanese: ああ？　ンだよ
English: What?

Japanese: ゴニョゴニョ　ゴニョゴニョゴニョ…
English: whisper whisper whisper

Japanese: ……ふんふん…
ああ　いいな　それ
English: ...Haha nice!

Japanese:
でしょー！　ということで　やるわよ！
ルカー！
English:
I know right? That said, time to get movin’!
Hey, Ruca!

Japanese: なに？　イリア　どうしたの？
English: Illia, what is it?

Japanese: それッ！！
English: Take that!

Japanese: うわっ！？　な　なにするの…？
English: H-Huh!? Wh-what are you doing...?

Japanese:
いひひひひひ…！
枕投げよ　ま・く・ら・な・げ！
English:
Hahaha, it’s a pillow fight!
A. Pillow. Fight!

Japanese: 枕投げ…
English: A pillow fight...

Japanese:
ああ　３人いるんだしよ
折角だからやろうぜ
English: We have three people! Let’s do it!

Japanese: お前　こういうのやったことねぇだろ？
English: You’ve never been in one before, right?

Japanese: う…うん…
English: Y-Yeah...

Japanese:
だから　ほら
オレたちに向かって　投げてみろよ
遠慮はいらねェ
English:
See? C’mon, try throwing one at us!
Don’t hold back!

Japanese: うん…！　……えい！
English: Okay! Take that!

Japanese:
ふっふ～ん　ル～～カ～～～
あたしに当てようなんて　１００年早いっての！
English:
Haha! You need a hundred more years
before you can hit me!

Japanese:
おらおら　ルカ！
スキだらけだぜっ！
English: Hah! You’re open!

Japanese: ルカ　覚悟っ！
English: Prepare yourself!

Japanese: イリア！　それコーダだよ！！
English: Illia! That’s Coda!!
Huh!?

Japanese: ルカ！　コーダ！　だ　大丈夫！？
English: Oh no... Ruca! Coda! You both aight?

Japanese: う…うん…　なんとかね……
English: Yeah... somehow...

Japanese: コーダ　大丈夫じゃないんだな　しかし
English: Coda’s not alright though...

Japanese:
はー…　よかった…
ホント　ビックリしたわ…
English:
Oh thank Cielo...
That scared the crap out of me...

Japanese:
おいルカ　ブツけたとこ　一応冷やしとけよ
腫れるかもしれねェからよ
English:
Ruca, we have to put some ice on
that before it starts swelling...

Japanese: うん　ありがとう
English: Yeah, thanks...

Japanese:
それにしても　枕投げって　すごく楽しいね
ちょっと痛かったけど…
English: But pillow fights sure are fun...

Japanese:
おっ　よさがわかってきたか！
冷やし終わったら　２回戦やろうぜ
English:
Haha you finally get it!
Let’s do another one once you’ve cooled off.

Japanese:
イリア　コーダを投げるな
投げるのは　枕だ
English:
Illia, don’t throw Coda!
Throw a pillow!

Japanese:
それくらいわかってるっての
あんたも　間違えるから
枕の近くにいないようにしなさいよね
English:
I know! Look, I might mistake you for a pillow
next time so make sure not to sleep next to one.

Japanese: ぷっ…あはははは！
English: Hahahaha!

Japanese: うん…！
English: okay...

Japanese: 寝坊
English: Oversleeping

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: イリア
English: Illia

Japanese: ルカー　今日の朝ご飯だけど……
English: Ruca, about breakfast...

Japanese:
うっわ…　珍しい　あのルカが寝坊なんて
イタズラしてやりたいところだけど
お腹もすいてるし…今は我慢我慢…
English:
Whoa, that’s rare! Ruca’s oversleeping...
Really, really tempted to play a prank
on him, but I’m kinda hungry, so...

Japanese: ルカ　起きて　ルカ　ルカってば！！
English: Ruca, wake up. Ruca!

Japanese: え？　ウソ　起きない…？
English: Huh? No way, he’s not waking up!

Japanese:
{fixed}（ムリもないか…　家を飛び出してから
　ずっと旅してきたんだし…）
English: (I... definitely won’t get to sleep tonight...)

Japanese: でも…
English: But...

Japanese: あたしのお腹も我慢の限界！
English: my stomach can’t take it any longer!

Japanese:
ルーカー　ルーカー！
いい加減　起きなさいよね！
English:
Ruuuca～♪ RUCA!
Cut that crap out and wake up!

Japanese: うわ！？　イ　イリア…！？
English: H-Huh!? I-Illia...!?

Japanese: なに　そんなに驚いてんの　失礼じゃない
English: Why are you acting so surprised? Rude!

Japanese:
ご　ごめん…　まさかイリアに
起こされるなんて　思ってなかったから…
English:
S-Sorry... I just didn’t expect you
to be the one waking me up.

Japanese:
ル～カ～　それって　暗に　いつもあたしが
寝坊しているって言いたいのかな～？
English:
Ruca～ are you telling me that
coz I’m always the one oversleeping?

Japanese:
ち　違うよ…　本当にびっくりしただけだよ
だから　特に深い意味とかは……
English:
No! Not at all! You really did surprise me!
So I didn’t really mean to imply anything...

Japanese:
ふーん　まぁいいわ
それじゃあ　行きましょう
English: Hm... Okay. Let’s go?

Japanese: う
English: Oh...

Japanese: レッツ！　ラクガキ
English: Let’s Doodle!

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: イリア
English: Illia

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese: コンウェイ
English: Kongwei

Japanese:
イシシシシシシシシ…
寝てる寝てる　よ～く寝てる
English:
Hihihihihi... Would you look at that～ He’s sleeping
without a caaare in the world～

Japanese:
ヒャハハハ
それじゃ　始めようぜ　準備はいいか？
English:
Hyahahahaha!
Shall we start then?
You ready, Illia?

Japanese:
もっちろんよ　なんのために
ペンを買ってきたと思ってんの
カッコよくしてあげるわ　ルカ～♪
English:
Of course. You were wondering what I bought these 
pens for... Don’t worry, my dear Ruca, I’ll make you 
look real handsome ♪

Japanese:
ンじゃあ　そっちはお前に任せた
オレはこっちを…っと
English:
Alright, I’m leaving you to that.
I’ll take care of this...

Japanese:
なにそれ　スパーダ　面白いじゃない～
あんたイイセンスしてるわ～
特にこのヒゲと目！　サイッコー！
English:
What’s that! Spada you’re so funny～ ♪ You have a 
good artistic taste ♪ Especially this beard and 
these eyes! This is great!

Japanese:
いやいや～
お前が書いた額の文字も　いい感じだぜ
English:
No, no～ ♪ The letters that you wrote on his forehead
look better!

Japanese:
ぶしゃしゃしゃしゃ！
明日が楽しみだわ～♪
English: Mwahahahaah! I’m looking forward to tomorrow～ ♪

Japanese: まったくだぜ　フヒャヒャヒャヒャ！
English: Hyahahahaha!

Japanese: 彼らも懲りないね
English: They never learn, do they?

Japanese:
このまま放置しておくのもなんだし
消しておこうか
今日だけの特別サービスだよ　ルカくん
English:
I cannot leave him like this. I shall just remove the 
doodles. I am doing this for you just this once, Ruca.

Japanese: もうひと勝負
English: Just another match

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: イリア
English: Illia

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese: それじゃあ　スパーダ　おやすみ
English: Okay then, good night Spada.

Japanese: おいおい　まだ寝るには早すぎるだろ？
English: Hey hey, it’s still too early to go to bed, isn’t it?

Japanese:
え？　でも　もうこんな時間…
コンウェイさんは先に寝てるし…
English:
Oh? But it’s already this late... And Kongwei already
went to bed...

Japanese:
ああ　あいつは別にいいさ
なぁ　ルカ　夜はまだまだこれからじゃねェか！
ほら　ひと勝負するぞ
English:
Oh, don’t mind him. Come on Ruca, the night is 
still young! Here, let’s play one round.

Japanese: ひと勝負って何をするの？
English: One round of what?

Japanese:
カードだよ　カード
ランダムでカードを引いて
大きいのを出した方が勝ちだ
English:
Cards, man! Let’s play a card game. Each one of us 
randomly draws a card and the one who has the
higher number wins.

Japanese:
負けたら　明日の朝ごはんのおかず一品な
ちなみに拒否権はなしだ
English:
The loser will give up one of his side dishes 
at breakfast. Oh and by the way, you can’t refuse.

Japanese: ええーー！？　そ　そんな……
English: H-Huh...!? B-But...

Japanese: ほら　先に引けよ
English: Come on, you first.

Japanese: う　うん………３だ
English: O-Okay... I got a three.

Japanese:
うひゃひゃひゃ　これは貰ったな
……よし　９だ
English: Hyahahahaha! I got this... YES! I got a nine!

Japanese: うぅ…
English: Ugh...

Japanese: も　もうひと勝負！
English: O-One more round!

Japanese: へへっ　何回でもやってやるぜ
English: Heh heh. I’ll do it as many times as you want.

Japanese:
や　やった…
こ　これで…７６５勝７６５敗…
English: Y-Yes! Th-That makes it 765 wins to 765 losses.

Japanese:
く　くそ…
ま　まだだ…まだこれから……
English:
D-Damn it. I’m not done yet.
O-One more round.

Japanese: ぐぅ
English: Ggh...

Japanese: ぼ　僕も……
English: M-Me too...

Japanese: もうだめ……
English: I can’t... do it anymore.

Japanese: おっはよー！　今日の朝ごはんだけど……
English: Morning! Today’s breakfast is...

Japanese: って………なにこれ…
English: Wh-What the hell happened here!?

Japanese: ロイヤルスイートルーム
English: Royal Suite Room

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: イリア
English: Illia

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese: コンウェイ
English: Kongwei

Japanese:
は～…　さすがロイヤルスイートルーム…
豪華すぎて　おかしくなりそう…
English:
Woah～... This is what you’d expect from the Royal
Suite Room... It’s almost comical how extravagant 
it is...

Japanese:
宿の手違いで　こんなにいい部屋に
泊まれるなんて　ラッキーだね
English:
We’re lucky to be able to stay in such a nice room
because of some hotel mix-up.

Japanese:
どこがラッキーなのよ！
一生分の運を使い果たしたんじゃないか心配よ！
English:
What do you mean we’re lucky!? I’m worried we might
have used up a lifetime’s worth of luck!

Japanese: ゴチャゴチャ言ってねェで　そろそろ寝ようぜ
English: Stop saying nonsense. Let’s go to sleep already...

Japanese: ん…？　コンウェイ　なに見てンだ？
English: Huh...? Kongwei, what are you looking at?

Japanese: この花瓶　なかなかの代物だね
English: This vase is a pretty fine work of art.

Japanese: だな
English: You’re right.

Japanese:
お…？　なぁ　ルカ
そこの花瓶もなかなかなモンじゃねェ？
English: Oh...? Hey Ruca, that vase is also pretty neat, isn’t it?

Japanese: 本当だ
English: Oh, it really is!

Japanese: あんたたち　なにやってんの！？
English: What are you guys doing!?

Japanese:
壊したりでもしたら　いくら取られるか
わからないんだから　むやみに触らないでよね！
English:
We don’t know how much these cost, so stop 
recklessly touching them or you might end up 
breaking them!

Japanese: ほら　その花瓶　下ろす！
English: Hey, put that vase down!

Japanese: う　うん…
English: O-Oh... Alright...

Japanese: はいはい
English: Fine, fine...

Japanese:
うぅ…　高いものばっかり…
あぁ…シャンデリアが目に痛い…
これなんて…一体いくらすんのよ…
English:
Uhh... There’s only expensive things... Ahh... Just 
looking at this chandelier gives me a headache...
How much would any...

Japanese:
これ以上起きてると　怖くてダメ…
もう寝る…
English:
Nevermind... I think I might end up stressing about this 
too much if I stay up any longer... For the sake of my 
mental well-being, good night.

Japanese:
あのベッドが一番高ェなんて
言わないほうが　良さそうだな
English:
Isn’t that bed the most expensive?
I think it’d be for the best not to tell her.

Japanese: うん…
English: Yes...

Japanese: 入り込んだネズミ
English: A Passing Rat

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese: リカルド
English: Ricardo

Japanese: コンウェイ
English: Kongwei

Japanese: なに？　今の音…
English: What was that noise just now?

Japanese: ちょっと様子見てくるか
English: I’m gonna go check it out.

Japanese: 待て　スパーダ
English: Hold on, Spada.

Japanese: ンだよ　おっさん
English: What the heck, old man?

Japanese:
確証はないが　追っ手かもしれん
迂闊な行動は取るな
English:
We don’t know yet, but it might be someone after us.
Don’t make any sudden movements...

Japanese: えぇっ…！？
English: Huhhhh!?

Japanese:
ルカくん　静かに
気づかれる
English:
Ruca, be careful!
Do not make a sound...

Japanese:
けどよ　追っ手って今更だぜ？
わざわざ　今になって
仕掛けてくる理由が　わかんねェ
English:
This late...?
I don’t get why they’d go after us at this hour.

Japanese:
で…でも　もしかしたら
油断しているところを叩く
作戦かもしれないよ…？
English:
B-But they might be looking for
a chance to ambush us...

Japanese:
とりあえず　俺が確認してくる
お前たちは　なにがあっても
すぐに対処できるようにしておけ
English:
At any rate, I’ll go and confirm the situation.
You should prepare for what might happen next.

Japanese: ああ
English: Right.

Japanese: リカルドさん　ひとりで大丈夫かな…？
English: Is Mr. Ricardo going to be alright...?

Japanese: あのおっさんなら　平気だろ
English: I’m sure he’ll be fine.

Japanese:
危なくなったら　彼から
なにかアクションがあると思うし
ボクたちは　待機していようよ
English:
He will know what to do when in danger.
First of all, we should be prepared for what
might happen.

Japanese: あっ…　リカルドさん　どうだった？
English: Oh... how was it, Ricardo?

Japanese: ネズミが一匹入り込んでいた
English: We had a rat...

Japanese:
チッ…
早くどこかに移動しねぇとな
English: Tch... we should get going.

Japanese: 僕　イリアたちを　起こしてくる
English: I’ll go wake the girls up.

Japanese: 待て　お前たち
English: Wait.

Japanese:
ネズミと言っても　本物だ
追っ手ではない
English:
It’s an actual rat.
No one’s after us...

Japanese: な…なんだぁ…よかった…
English: Oh... phew...

Japanese: ンだよ　警戒して損したぜ
English: What the heck? All that for nothing!?

Japanese:
なに　俺だって間違えることもある
しかし　こういった些細なことにも
注意を向けなければ　いつか命を落とす
English:
What? Even I make mistakes, alright?
If I don’t pay attention to these little things,
it might end up getting me someday.

Japanese:
リカルドさんの
ありがたいお話はおいておいて
夜も更けてきたし　そろそろ寝ようか
English:
Let us thank Ricardo later. It has gotten late...
We should go to sleep.

Japanese: へーい
English: Fine.

Japanese: ……俺も寝るとするか
English: I should go to sleep too...

Japanese: 抜き足差し足１
English: Walking on Tiptoes 1

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese: コンウェイ
English: Kongwei

Japanese: リカルド
English: Ricardo

Japanese: じゃあ　ボクは先に休ませてもらうよ
English: Well, I shall be going to bed now.

Japanese:
あっ　僕も
スパーダ　おやすみ
English:
Me too.
Good night, Spada.

Japanese: おう　おやすみ
English: Right, good night.

Japanese: ルカとコンウェイは………寝たな
English: Ruca and Kongwei... are both definitely sleeping.

Japanese:
隣に秘密の花園があるというのに
もったいねェヤツだ
English:
Such a shame when the Secret Garden 
is right next door.

Japanese: 男なら行くしかねェだろ？
English:
A pilgrimage that you definitely
have to take if you’re a man!

Japanese: 抜き足　差し足…
English: Tiptoe... tiptoe...

Japanese: ううーん……
English: Hmmm...

Japanese: チッ　起こしちまったか…？
English: Tch, did I wake him up...?

Japanese: …もう…食べられないよ…
English: Auugh... I can’t... eat anymore...

Japanese: 寝言かよっ！？
English: Sleep Talking!?

Japanese:
しかも　もう食べられねェとか…
なんてお約束すぎるだろ
English: And he’s dreaming about food too... typical!

Japanese:
ま　寝てるのなら問題ねェ
…忍び足っと
English:
Well, should be fine as long as he’s not awake...
tiptoe...

Japanese: …何をしている
English: What are you doing...?

Japanese: い　いや…ちょっとお手洗いにだな
English: N-Nothing, just going to the bathroom...

Japanese:
そうか
トイレは女の部屋と逆の方向だ
早く行ってこい
English:
That’s the girls’ room.
If you’re looking for the bathroom,
it’s over there. Hurry up.

Japanese: ばれてんじゃねェか…
English: Tch...

Japanese: 何か言ったか？
English: You were saying something?

Japanese: な　なんでもねェよ！
English: N-Nothing!

Japanese: じゃあ　いってくらぁ
English: I’ll be going now!

Japanese: …全く　仕方ない奴だ
English: Hopeless brat.

Japanese: アンジュ
English: Ange

Japanese: コーダ
English: Coda

Japanese: イリア
English: Illia

Japanese: ふふっ…♪
English: (Humming)

Japanese:
アンジュ　ご機嫌だな
なんか　あったのか？
English:
Ange’s in a good mood today.
What happened, Ange?

Japanese:
あら　見つかっちゃったのね
さっき　信者さんからワインをいただいたの
English:
Oh my, you found me. You see, a believer gave me
some wine earlier.

Japanese:
アンジュ　ずるいんだな
しかし　コーダも飲むんだな
English: Ange’s so stingy! Let Coda drink some too!

Japanese: それは構わないけど…大丈夫？
English: Sure, but are you sure you want some...?

Japanese: 食べ物なら　なんでも平気なんだな
English: Coda’s fine as long as it’s food!

Japanese: ひとりで飲むのも寂しいし　一緒に飲みましょう
English: Since it’s lonely drinking alone, let’s drink together～!

Japanese: アンジュいいヤツ　ありがとなんだな
English: Ange’s good! Thank you, Ange!

Japanese: １時間後
English: 1 Hour Later

Japanese:
ヌフヌフ～♪
なんだか　気分がいいんだな　しかし♪
English:
Fufufufu～ ♪
Coda feels good for some reason! ♪

Japanese:
コーダ　飲みすぎよ　大丈夫？
今日はもう　その辺にしときましょう？
English:
Are you all right? You drank a lot. Should we 
stop for today?

Japanese: ぬふぬふ～♪　しかし　まだイケるんだな
English: Fufufufu～ ♪ Coda can still drink more!

Japanese:
ダメよ
明日も早いし　もう寝ましょうね
English:
No, we’ll be leaving early tomorrow. 
Let’s just go to sleep.

Japanese:
おー　わかった
しかし　アンジュ　また飲むんだな
English:
Alright!
Let’s drink again later!

Japanese:
ええ
それじゃあ　私は片付けてくるわ
English: Sure, I’ll clean up here.

Japanese: コーダ　寝るんだな　イリア～♪
English: Illia～♪ Coda’s sleepy～

Japanese:
……………クッサ！
酒クサッ！　入ってこないでよ！！
English:
...YUCK YOU STINK OF BOOZE!
Don’t you dare dare come near me!

Japanese: きゅう………
English: Aww...

Japanese:
コーダったら　床で眠っちゃって…
もう…　これじゃ　風邪ひいちゃうわ
毛布毛布…
English:
And he ended up sleeping on the floor...
He’s gonna get a cold at this rate, I should find 
him a blanket.

Japanese:
これでいいわね
さて　私も寝ないと…
おやすみなさい
English:
This should do...
I guess I should sleep too... good night.

Japanese: ちょっと恥ずかしいけど
English: It’s a Bit Embarrassing Though...

Japanese: チトセ
English: Chitose

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: イリア
English: Illia

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese: アンジュ
English: Ange

Japanese: リカルド
English: Ricardo

Japanese: コンウェイ
English: Kongwei

Japanese:
部屋割りの都合で
一人部屋になっちゃったけど……
English: I ended up getting a single room, but...

Japanese: たまには　ひとりで静かなのもいいかも
English: I guess it’s nice being left alone for once.

Japanese:
そうだ
いつもは邪魔されてできないから
今のうちに　勉強でもしようかな
English:
Oh, I know! Why don’t I study for once?
I never get the chance to since I always
end up being disturbed.

Japanese:
……もうこんな時間か
そろそろ寝ようかな
English:
Oh, it’s this late already?
I should go to sleep.

Japanese:
ぶるるっ　ベッドに入ったはいいけど
やっぱり夜は冷え込むなぁ
English:
Brr... being in a bed’s better and all,
but it really does get cold at night.

Japanese:
ちょっと恥ずかしいけど
抱き合って寝たらあったかいかも
English:
It’s a bit embarrassing, but it should
be warmer if we hug each other.

Japanese:
そうだね
お互いの体温で温めあって……
English:
That’s true, let’s use our body
heat to warm each--

Japanese:
チ　チトセさん！？
どうして僕のベッドの中にいるの！？
English:
Ch-Chitose!?
Wh-Why are you in my bed!?

Japanese: ルカくんの近くで　眠りたいなって思って
English: Why? I wanted to sleep next to you, of course.

Japanese: だからって……
English: But...

Japanese:
そんなことより
私も寒いから…　ね？
English:
That said, I’m cold so...
please?

Japanese:
うわっ！
チトセさん　近い近い！
English:
Ch-Chitose!
C-Close! Too close!

Japanese: ふふふふふっ
English: Heheheheh...

Japanese:
ちょっと　ルカ
ひとりでなに騒いでんのよ
夜中に迷惑でしょ！
English:
Hey, do you know what time it is!?
It’s like the middle of the night,
there are people trying to sleep!

Japanese: イリア！？
English: Illia!?

Japanese:
ルカ！
あんた　なにやってんのよっ！？
English:
Ruca!
What the heck are you doing!?

Japanese:
ふたりの愛の巣に入ってくるなんて
相変わらず　無粋ね
English:
Tactless as ever...

munch

Huh!? Th-that’s horrible! H-How are we gonna explain
this to the innkeeper?

Japanese: 兄ちゃんがボケてどうするん？
English: Whatcha think yer doin’, Ruca Bro?

Japanese:
ちゃんと突っ込んでぇな！
今のはダジャレやで！
English:
That was s’pposed ta be a pun! Learn 
ta read the atmosphere more!

Japanese: え？　ダジャレ…？
English: Huh? A pun...?

Japanese:
あかん　兄ちゃんにツッコミを求めた
ウチが悪かったわ…
English:
Sheesh... sorry, Ruca Bro, it was mah fault
fer expectin’ ya ta go along with the joke.

Japanese:
ううん　ごめんね　エル
今度から　頑張ってみる
English: Sorry... I’ll try harder from now on.

Japanese: ホンマ？
English: Really?

Japanese: うん
English: Yeah.

Japanese:
でも　エル　今の布団が吹っ飛んだって
どこがダジャレなの？
English: But how is a futon vanishing supposed to be a joke?

Japanese: こりゃ　あかんわ…
English: Dude...

Japanese: 風邪ひきの特権
English: Privilege of a Sick Person

Japanese: エルマーナ
English: Hermana

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: イリア
English: Illia

Japanese: アンジュ
English: Ange

Japanese: はっくしょん…！
English: Achoo...!

Japanese: ルカくん　風邪？
English: Do you have a cold, Ruca?

Japanese:
ううん　違うと思う
鼻がムズムズしただけだし
English:
Hm... I don’t think so?
My nose just felt itchy all of a sudden...

Japanese:
せやけどそれ　風邪の症状ちゃうん？
体　ダルない？
English:
But ain’t that a symptom of a cold?
Does yer body feel heavy?

Japanese: そういえば　少し…
English: Now that you mention it... only a bit...

Japanese:
ルカ　あんたなにしてんのよ
体調悪いなら　早めに言いなさいよね
酷くなったら大変じゃない
English:
Ruca, what the heck are you thinking!?
If you’re feeling sick you should tell us!
What if it gets worse!?

Japanese: 今日はもう　休んだほうがよさそうね
English: You should rest for today.

Japanese:
そうやで　ルカ兄ちゃん
はよ　ベッドに入り
English: She’s right. So, ya better get inta the bed, Ruca Bro.

Japanese:
でもエル　僕の部屋　隣だよ？
ここで寝たら　みんなの邪魔になっちゃうよ
English:
But my room’s just next door.
I’ll just end up bothering everyone if I sleep here.

Japanese:
それくらい大丈夫　心配はいらないわ
それよりも今は　ルカくんの体のほうが心配
English:
You should not worry about that,
what you should worry about is your body.

She’s right, it’s not like you’re doing well yourself.
And it would be a real problem if you collapsed
on the road. That’s why you should rest.

Japanese:
せやで
ほらほら　ルカ兄ちゃん　寝た寝た
English: Exactly. That’s why ya should sleep, hear?

Japanese:
あとで　なにか温かいものを持ってくるわ
なにかリクエストはある？
English:
I shall bring something warm later.
Do you have any requests?

Japanese: ううん　大丈夫　任せるよ
English: Nothing much. I’ll be fine.

Japanese:
{fixed}（…こんなふうに優しくされるなんて
　なんだか嬉しいなぁ…！）
English: (Everyone’s treating me so nicely... it feels nice.)

Japanese: それじゃあ　おやすみなさい
English: Good night...

Japanese: 寝ぼけて
English: Half-Awake

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: エルマーナ
English: Hermana

Japanese: アンジュ
English: Ange

Japanese: コンウェイ
English: Kongwei

Japanese: うわぁ…！？
English: Huh!?

Japanese: あ　あれ…エル？　どうしたの　一体…
English: H-Huh...? What’s wrong... Hermie?

Japanese:
……ムニャ…そないに…食べ……へん…
………ムニャムニャ…
English: Hmmm... Ah... Ah can’t eat... any...

Japanese: エル？　エル　寝てる…の…？
English: Hermie? Are you asleep, Hermie?

Japanese: ムニャムニャ……
English: Hmnnnnnn...

Japanese:
……寝ぼけて入ってきちゃったんだ…
ど　どうしよう…
English:
Looks like she sleepwalked all the way here...
Wh-What should I do...?

Japanese: エル　エル　起きて
English: Hermie... Hermie, wake up...

Japanese:
……ムニャ…
も……少し…寝か……て～な……
English: Hmm... jus’ a bit... more～...

Japanese: ダメか…
English: She’s not waking up...

Japanese: そのまま寝る
English: Go back to sleep

Japanese: ムリにでも部屋に連れていく
English: Carry her back to her room

Japanese:
起きなさそうだし　仕方ないか…
おやすみ　エル
English:
Well, it doesn’t look like she’s gonna wake up.
I shouldn’t force her. Good night, Hermie.

Japanese: ……ムニャ…………ムニャ…
English: Hmm...

Japanese: ふあぁぁ…　よぅ寝たなぁ…ん……？
English: *yawn* Ah sure slept well... hm?

Japanese:
な…なんで　ルカ兄ちゃんがおるん！？
はっ！？　ここ　ウチの部屋やない…
English:
Huh!? Why’s Ruca Bro here?
Hol’ up! This ain’t my room...!

Japanese:
ま　ま　まさかウチ……
ア…アンジュ姉ちゃーん！！
English: Wait... it can’t be... S-Sis Ange!!
...Y-Yeah...

Japanese: あれ…？　エル　もう起きたのかな
English: Huh...? Looks like Hermie’s already awake.

Japanese: ルカくん！！
English: Ruca!!

Japanese: あ　アンジュ　おはよう
English: Oh, good morning, Ange.

Japanese:
珍しいね　アンジュがノックしないなんて
なにかあったの？
English:
That’s unusual, you usually knock before you enter...
What’s up?

Japanese: エルになにをしたの？
English: What did you do to Hermie!?

Japanese:
エルに？　なにを？
ねぇ　どういうこと？
English:
What did I do to Hermie?
What do you mean?

Japanese:
とぼけないで
エル　朝　目が覚めたら
ルカくんのベッドにいたんですって
English:
Do not play dumb with me!
Hermie told me that she woke up into your bed!

Japanese:
寝ている子を　ベッドに連れ込むなんて…
ルカくん　あなたはそんな子じゃないって
思っていたのに…
English:
To bring a sleeping child in your bed...
I never thought that you were
that type of person.

Japanese: あ　あれは　エルが……
English: O-Oh... that... she...

Japanese:
あれは彼女が　寝ぼけて彼のベッドに
入り込んだんだよ
English: She was the one who sleep-walked into his bed.

Japanese: ちなみに彼は　彼女になにもしていないよ
English: He never laid a hand on her.

Japanese: 本当？
English: Is that true?

Japanese:
もちろん本当さ
ルカくんに　彼女をどうこうする勇気はないよ
English:
Of course it is.
Ruca is not brave enough to do such a thing.

Japanese: ……それは…同意せざるを得ないわね
English: I... I cannot deny that...

Japanese:
ルカくん　ごめんなさい
私　エルの話を聞いて
早とちりしてしまったようね
English:
I am sorry, I must have misunderstood
after hearing what Hermie said.

Japanese: エルには　私から注意しておくわ
English: I shall warn Hermie as well.

Japanese:
ううん
誤解が解けたのなら　それでいいよ
だから　気にしないで
English:
It’s fine, I’m just glad that the
misunderstanding got clarified.

Japanese:
ありがとう
あなたの優しさに救われるわ
English: Thank you. May Cielo bless your kindness.

Japanese: ボクには　なにか言うことはないのかな？
English: What about me?

Japanese:
コンウェイさんもありがとう
本当に助かったよ
English: Thanks for saving me, Kongwei.

Japanese: どういたしまして
English: You are welcome.

Japanese:
変に誤解でもされたら困るし
ムリにでも　部屋に連れていったほうがいいよね
English:
I might end up being accused of something weird
again, so let’s just carry her back to her room.

Japanese: よし…と…
English: Alley... oop!

Japanese: ふあぁぁ…　さて寝よう…
English: Sigh... Good night...

Japanese: 誰と話をしているの？
English: Who are You Talking to?

Japanese: イリア
English: Illia

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: エルマーナ
English: Hermana

Japanese: アンジュ
English: Ange

Japanese: リカルド
English: Ricardo

Japanese: コンウェイ
English: Kongwei

Japanese:
あれ？　キミは…　なんでそこにいるの？
結構　危ないと思うよ
English:
Oh, hello! What are you doing there?
That is a pretty dangerous spot you are on.

Japanese:
へぇ
じゃあ　キミにとって　そこが特等席なんだね
English: Ohhh, so that is your special place...

Japanese:
いや　ボクは遠慮しておくよ
ここも悪くないからね
English:
Hm? Oh, no thanks.
This spot is also quite comfortable, you see.

Japanese:
ああ　この窓辺も結構　陽の光が入るからね
あたたかいよ
English:
It is quite warm here since the sunlight

Japanese:
あはははは
キミ　なかなか頑固だね
English: Hahaha... You are pretty stubborn, aren’t you?

Japanese:
ごめん　ごめん
そんなにスネないで
English: Come now, do not make that face, my apologies...

Japanese:
バイバイ
気をつけてね
English: Bye bye! Take care now!

Japanese:
あれ？　みんないつの間に
どうしたの？
English: Hm? How long have you guys been there?

Japanese:
ねぇ　コンウェイ…
あんた　大丈夫？
English: Kongwei... are you aight?

Japanese:
熱あらへん？
どこも体　おかしくないん？
English: Got a fever? Does yer body hurt?

Japanese:
いたって健康だけど
ふたりの質問の意図がわからないよ
なにが聞きたいの？
English:
I feel the same as usual.
Why the sudden question?

今　誰かと話をしていたよね？
その…　誰もいないのに…
English:
You were talking to someone just now...
but nobody’s there.

Japanese:
ああ　そのことか
「誰か」なら居たよ
English: Ohh... that someone already went back.

Japanese:
俺たちなら　全員ここにいる
他に誰が居るんだ？
English:
We’re all here though.
Are you talking about someone else?

Japanese: ネコだよ
English: I was talking about the cat.

Japanese: ２人
English: Two of them

Japanese: はぁ！？　ネコ！？
English: The “cat!?”

Japanese:
窓を開けたら　鳴き声が聞こえてね
外をのぞいてみたら居たのさ
English:
They were sitting right outside the window. You could 
have heard their meow if the window was open.

Japanese:
なんだぁ　ネコだったのね
てっきり　幻覚でも見てるんじゃないかと…
English:
Ohh so it was a cat...
I thought you were having a hallucination...

Japanese:
ふふっ　酷いなぁ
そんなふうに　見てたのか
English:
So that is how you think of me.
Oh, how cruel～

Japanese:
さてと　それじゃあ
ボクはちょっと出かけてくるよ
見たいものがあるんだ
English: Now, if you excuse me, I shall be heading out for a bit...

Japanese: なんだか　機嫌よさそうだったね
English: He seemed to be in a good mood.

Japanese: ネコと話でもして　気分がよかったんだろ
English: Talking to the cat must’ve felt nice.

Japanese:
あら？　でもネコと話すって…
普通は出来ないんじゃ……
English:
Hm? But you cannot just...
talk to cats... right?

Japanese: ま…　まさかね…
English: P-Probably not...?

Japanese: 布団ゆえの悲劇
English: A Futonic Disaster

Japanese: イリア
English: Illia

Japanese: エルマーナ
English: Hermana

Japanese: アンジュ
English: Ange

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: 床に寝るって聞いたときは驚いたけど…
English:
I was shocked to hear that we were
supposed to sleep on the floor on a...

Japanese: お布団だっけ？
English: This is a “futon”, correct?

Japanese: ふかふかで気持ちよさそうね
English: It is very soft and fluffy.

Japanese:
せやなぁ
それにこれやったら
寝相の悪いイリア姉ちゃんも安心やで
English:
Yeah, an’ those with bad sleepin’ postures
like Sis Illia can finally sleep soundly.

Japanese: そうそう　あたしよくベッドから落ちるから……
English:
I know right, if I had a penny for
every time I fell from--

Japanese: って　それはあんたでしょ！
English: Wait, you were the one who kept falling!

Japanese: え～　イリア姉ちゃんのが多いやんか～
English: But ya fell lotsa times too!

Japanese:
はいはい　そこまで
もう寝ましょ？
English:
That is enough, you two.
Let us sleep.

Japanese: イリア＆エル
English: Illia & Hermana

Japanese: はーい
English: Okay!

Japanese:
…う～ん……
トイレ…
English: Bathroom...

Japanese: ぐえっ！？
English: Gueh!?

Japanese:
床に寝てるからって
それはないぜルカ……ガクッ！
English:
Just coz you’re sleeping on the floor
doesn’t mean... Sigh...

English: Fish Caught in the Net

English: Ruca

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese: コンウェイ
English: Kongwei

Japanese: コーダ
English: Coda

Japanese:
布団で寝るのも　これで何度目かな？
最初は慣れなかったけど　今じゃ快適だよね
English:
I wonder how many times we’ve slept on the floor?
It was hard the first time, but now it’s quite comfortable.

Japanese: だな
English: I know, right?

Japanese:
ん…？　なんだ…こりゃ…？
布団のまわりに変な網がかかってやがんな
English:
So... what the heck’s up
with this weird net thing?

Japanese:
蚊帳って言うそうだよ
なんでも　害虫を寄せ付けないように
するために　張っているらしいね
English:
I believe it is called a “mosquito net.”
Its purpose is to stop insects from
biting you while you sleep.

Japanese: へぇ　天蓋みたいなモンか
English: Ooooh, so it’s just like a dome.

Japanese:
引っかかった
助けて欲しいんだな　しかし
English: Coda got caught! Help me though!!

Japanese: うわわ…！　待ってて…！
English: Huh!? H-H-Hold on!

Japanese:
なぁ　コンウェイ
コーダのあの姿ってよ……
English: Hey, Kongwei, doesn’t Coda kinda look like...

Japanese: 網にかかった魚のようだね
English: A fish caught in a net.

Japanese: おー　取れないんだな　しかし
English: I-I can’t g-g-get it off!

Japanese: わっわっ…！？　動かないで…！
English: D-Don’t move!

Japanese: 抜き足差し足３
English: Walking on Tiptoes 3

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese: エルマーナ
English: Hermana

Japanese:
来た！　とうとうこの日が！
このチャンスを逃す手はねェ！！
English:
Today’s the day!
I won’t let this chance get away!

Japanese: 抜き足　差し足…
English: Tiptoe... tiptoe...

Japanese: ううーん……
English: Hngh...

Japanese: チッ　起こしちまったか…？
English: Did... did I wake him up?

Japanese: …スパーダぁ…
English: Spada...

Japanese: ……オレの夢か？
English: Oh, is he dreaming about me?

Japanese: ……お手…
English: ...Let me...

Japanese:
……起きたらたっぷり
可愛がってやらねェとな
English: ...I should treat him tomorrow.

Japanese: ま　寝てるのなら問題ねェ
English: Well, should be fine as long as he’s not awake.

Japanese: …忍び足っと
English: Tiptoe... Tiptoe...

Japanese:
あれ？
スパーダ兄ちゃん　なにしとるん？
English: Hm? What’re ya doin’ Spada Bro?

Japanese:
げっ…エ　エル
お前の方こそ何してるんだ？
English:
Tch... I-I should ask you the same thing, Hermie?
What are you doing?

Japanese:
スパーダ兄ちゃん…
ウチにそないなこと言わせるん…？
English:
Ah... Ah can’t believe yer makin’
me say that...

Japanese: ま　まさか…お前…！
English: Wait... you’re not... are you!?

Japanese: せやねん…実はな…
English: Exactly, ta be honest with ya, Ah...

Japanese: 実は…？
English: You...?

Japanese: トイレ行っとってん
English: Ah hafta go ta the toilet.

Japanese: トイレかよ！
English: You’re going to the toilet!?

Japanese:
なに　スパーダ兄ちゃん
変なこと考えとったん？
English:
What’s with that reaction?
Were ya thinkin’ of sumthin’ weird?

Japanese: そんなワケねーだろ！
English: Course I’m not!

Japanese:
そうやんなぁ
スパーダ兄ちゃんに限って
そないなコトあらへんよな
English:
Course ya ain’t.
Yer totally not thinkin’ of sumthin’ weird.

Japanese:
ほな　ウチはもう寝るから
スパーダ兄ちゃんも
アホなコトしとらんではよ寝ぇやぁ
English:
A’ight, Ah’mma head off ta bed so ya should
stop thinkin’ of doin’ sumthin’ dumb an’
go ta bed too.

Japanese: …ばればれじゃねぇか…
English: She totally knows...

Japanese: はぁ…　部屋戻って寝るか
English: Sigh... I should just go back to bed.

Japanese: 新技実験
English: Experimenting on a New Arte

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: エルマーナ
English: Hermana

Japanese: コンウェイ
English: Kongwei

Japanese:
なぁなぁ　ルカ兄ちゃん
新技考えたんやけど
練習に付き合ってくれへん？
English:
Hey, Ruca Bro, Ah’ve been thinkin’ ’bout
a new move. D’ya wanna practice with me?

Japanese: 新技？　すごいね！　どんなの？
English: Cool! What kind of move is it?

Japanese: それは見てのお楽しみや
English: Here, lemme show ya!

Japanese: エル……？
English: Hermie?

Japanese: 必殺！　抱腹絶倒！
English: Sure fire kill! Side-splittin’ Laughter!

Japanese:
あははははははははは！
エ　エル　くすぐ…くすぐったいよ…！
English:
AHAHAHAHA. H-H-Hermie...!
That... haha... that tickles!

Japanese: おっと…ルカくん　大丈夫？
English: Whoa, are you all right, Ruca?

Japanese:
コ…　コンウェイ…さ…と　とめ…
とめて…
English:
K-Kongwei... hahahaha... st- hehe...
stop... her...

Japanese: あははははは…！！
English: hahaha

Japanese:
エル　その辺にしておいたら？
ルカくんが笑い死にしてしまうよ
English:
Hermie, can you cut that out?
Ruca is already dying from laughter.

Japanese: しゃあないなぁ…
English: Aww...

Japanese: はぁはぁ………
English: Hah... hah...

Japanese:
ルカ兄ちゃん　ウチの新技どやった？
めっさ効いた？
English:
How was that, Ruca Bro?
Was it very effective?

Japanese:
き　効いたよ…
でも　魔物には効かないと思うよ…
English:
It... it was... but I don’t think it’d be
effective against monsters.

Japanese: うーん　やっぱアカンか
English: Awww... Ah knew it.

Japanese: 兄ちゃん　付き合ってくれてありがとうな
English: Thanks fer the feedback!

Japanese: ううん　またなにか思いついたら　見せてね
English:
Well, if you think up something else,
why don’t you let me know?

English: Ruca

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese:

今日もリカルドのおっさんは別部屋だ！
English:
Alright, Ruca’s asleep and that old man

Japanese:

今日こそは成し遂げてみせる！
English:
Today’s the day!
I’ll finally make it!

Japanese: 抜き足　差し足…
English: Tiptoe... tiptoe...

Japanese: ううーん……
English: Hngh...

Japanese: チッ　起こしちまったか…？
English: Did... did I wake him up?

Japanese:
…イ…イリアぁ…
……も　もう食べられな…むぐっ…
English: Illia... I can’t... eat any more...

Japanese: ……不幸なヤツ
English: Unlucky guy.

Japanese: ま　寝てるのなら問題ねェ
English: Well, should be fine as long as he’s not awake...

Japanese: …忍び足っと
English: Tiptoe... tiptoe...

Japanese: ……よし　誰もいねェな
English: Right... no one’s here.

Japanese: 長かった…これでやっと行けるぜ
English: Phew, I can finally head off...

Japanese: あら　どこへ行くの？
English: Oh my, where are you going?

Japanese:
それはもちろん！
男の夢！　秘密の花園に！
English:
Isn’t that obvious!?
I’m going to the Secret Garden! The Paradise of Man!

Japanese: その話　詳しく聞かせて欲しいなぁ
English: Mind thoroughly explaining what that is to me?

Japanese: ア　アンジュ…
English: A-Ange...

Japanese:
スパーダくん　どうしたの？
狐につままれたような顔をしちゃって
English:
Oh my, what is wrong?
You look like you have seen a ghost.

Japanese: …どうしてここに…？
English: Wh-why are you here...?

Japanese:
リカルドさんとエルから話を聞いてね
スパーダくんが　怪しいことをしてるって
English:
My, Sir Ricardo and Hermie both told me
that you’ve been acting strange lately.

Japanese:
さ　お姉さんとお話しましょうね
たっぷりと
English: Now, let’s talk.

Japanese: ま　待て！　待ってくれぇぇぇ……
English: H-Hold on, Ange, I-I can explain!

Japanese: 朝が早い
English: Early Bird

Japanese: アンジュ
English: Ange

Japanese: エルマーナ
English: Hermana

Japanese: イリア
English: Illia

Japanese: う…ん……
English: Hnnn...

Japanese: うるっさいわね…
English: too noisy...

Japanese: ふあぁぁぁ…
English: *yawns*

Japanese: なんや…？　今の音……
English: Huh...? What was that sound jus’ now?

Japanese: 汽笛ね　さすが港　朝が早い
English:
A ship horn. As expected of a port, it is
already lively this early in the morning.

Japanese: ゲッ…　まだこんな時間じゃん…
English: Ugh, at this time!? Arghhh!

Japanese: もう１回寝る！　おやすみ！
English: I’m going back to sleep. Good night!

Japanese: ウチも寝るわ
English: Me too...

Japanese:
あ～～～もう！　うるさいっての！
なんなのよ！
English:
Too noisy! Too. Noisy!
What the heck is their problem!?

Japanese:
うーん
この港では　これが普通なのかもしれないわね
English: Hm... I believe this is the port’s usual schedule.

Japanese: 朝早いのに　ようがんばるなぁ
English: They sure are workin’ hard this early in the mornin’.

Japanese:
これじゃ眠れないっての！
ちょっと抗議してくる！！
English:
I can’t sleep at this rate!
I’m gonna go tell them to shut up!

Japanese: イリア姉ちゃん　ウチも行くで！
English: Take me with ya, Sis Illia!

Japanese: ふぁ…　私はもう一眠りしようかな
English: Sigh... I am going to take a nap.

Japanese: 額の傷１
English: Forehead Scar 1

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: リカルド
English: Ricardo

Japanese:
ねぇ　リカルドさん
前々から気になってたんだけど
額の傷って　なんで出来たの…？
English:
Hey, Ricardo, I’ve been wondering
for a while now, but...
how did you get your scar?

Japanese:
ごめん
触れられたくなかったよね
English:
I’m sorry...
I brought up something I shouldn’t have.

Japanese:
構わんが…
お前が期待しているような話は一切ない
English: I don’t mind, but don’t expect anything.

Japanese: むしろ　この傷は……
English: At that time I...

Japanese:
……いや　やめておこう
時に語らない方が良いこともあるだろう
English: ...No, never mind. It’s better that you don’t know.

Japanese: えぇ～……
English: Aww...

Japanese: 夜も更けてきた　そろそろ寝るぞ
English: It’s late. Let’s go to sleep.

Japanese: 額の傷２
English: Forehead Scar 2

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: コンウェイ
English: Kongwei

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese: リカルド
English: Ricardo

Japanese:
ねぇ　ふたりとも
リカルドさんの額の傷って
なんで出来たと思う？
English: Hey, how do you think Ricardo got his scar?

Japanese:
藪から棒だね
そんなに気になるものかな？
English:
Well that was unexpected.
Are you really curious about it?

Japanese:
前に　リカルドさんに聞いてみたんだけど
教えてくれなくって
English:
I’ve asked him about it before,
but he wouldn’t tell me.

Japanese:
だから　なにかすごい理由が
あるんじゃないかなって思ってね
English:
He must’ve had some huge reason
why he couldn’t say it.

Japanese: それでオレたちで　推測してみようってことか
English: And so you want us to guess how he got it?

Japanese:
うん
ねぇ　ふたりはどう思う？
English: Yeah, so... what do you think?

Japanese:
おっさんのことだし　どうせ戦傷だろ
それ以外だったら　訓練中についたか
ぐらいしかねェだろ
English:
Well, it’s the old man we’re talking about.
He must’ve gotten it either on the battlefield
or from training.

Japanese:
それは　どうかな
案外　意外な理由でついたのかもしれないよ
English:
I wonder... he might have some surprising
reason on why he got it.

Japanese: じゃあ　お前はどう考えるんだ？
English: Then what do you think?

Japanese: それは……
English: Well...

Japanese: はぁ？　あのおっさんが女に？
English: That old man? A woman?

Japanese: ヒャハハハハ！　そりゃ　ありえねェって！
English: Hyahahahaha! No way!

Japanese:
そうだよ
リカルドさんに限って　それはないと思う
English:
Yeah! I don’t think Ricardo would be
the type to let that happen!

Japanese: それは残念
English: That is unfortunate...

Japanese: 日ごろのオレのイメージが　功を奏するとはな
English:
To think that the usual image
I’ve cultivated would work.

Japanese:
それにしても　コンウェイ…
しばらく様子を見る必要がありそうだな
English:
That said, I guess I’ll have to keep an eye on
Kongwei for a while.

Japanese: 来ちゃった
English: She’s Here!

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese: チトセ
English: Chitose

Japanese: イリア
English: Illia

Japanese: コンウェイ
English: Kongwei

Japanese: リカルド
English: Ricardo

Japanese: じゃあ　先に温泉に行ってるね
English: I’m gonna go to the hot springs first.

Japanese: おう　あとでな
English: Right, see you later.

Japanese:
え～と　男湯はっと…
あれ？　ヘンだな
いつもは右側が男湯なのに今日は左側…
English:
Hm...?
Strange, the men’s bath is usually on
the left, but today it’s on the right...

Japanese:
掃除してるのかな？
まっ　いっか！
English: I wonder if they’re cleaning it?

Japanese: ふぅ～
English: Ha～

Japanese: あ　みんな来たのかな
English: Oh, I wonder if that’s them?

Japanese:
ふふっ　ルカくん
奇遇ね
English: Oh my! What a coincidence～

Japanese:
チ　チトセさん！？
え…えぇっ！？　ここ男湯だよ！？
English:
Miss Ch-Ch-Chitose!?
Th-th-this is the men’s bath!

Japanese:
男湯？
そんなこと　今は置いておきましょうよ
English:
“Men’s bath?”
Let’s just ignore that for now～

Japanese:
ねぇ　ルカくん
折角だから　一緒に楽しく入りましょう
ここにいるのは　私たちだけだし…ね？
English:
It’s been a while since we’ve been alone...
Why don’t we enjoy the bath while we can?

Japanese: で…　でも　だからって……
English: B-But...

Japanese: ほら　２人でお話しましょう？
English: Let’s talk together～

Japanese: それとも…　私とのお話はイヤ…？
English: Or... are you saying you don’t want to be with me?

Japanese:
うわっ！
チトセさん　近い近い！
English: Wh-Whoa! Miss Chitose... You’re too c-c-close!

Japanese: ふふふふふっ
English: Heheheheh...

Japanese: イリア！？
English: Illia!?

Japanese:
ルカ！
あんた　なにやってんのよっ！？
English:
Ruca!?
What the heck are you doing here!?

Japanese: イ…イリアこそ…　ここ男湯じゃ…
English:
I-I should ask you the same thing...
Isn’t this the men’s bath...?

Japanese: はぁ！？　なに言ってんの　ここは女湯よ！
English: What are you saying!? This is the WOMEN’S BATH!

Japanese: で…でも　のれんに男湯って…
English: B-But the curtain said...

Japanese:
はぁ？
そんなのどうでもいいから
さっさと出て行きなさいよ！
English:
Huh!?
Who cares about that,
GET. OUT!

Japanese:
出ていくのは　あなたよ
私はルカくんと　２人っきりで入りたいの
English:
You get out.
I want to take a bath with Ruca.

Japanese:
ルカくんだって　あんな絶壁より
やわらかいほうが好きでしょ？
English:
You want someone softer than that
cliff over there don’t you, Ruca?

Japanese:
わわっ！
チトセさん　近い近いからっ！
English:
A-Again, please!
Y-You’re too close, Miss Chitose!

Japanese: あんた　敵ね？　あたしの敵ね？　敵なら撃つ！
English:
You’re an enemy, right? My enemy, right!?
Prepare yourself!

Japanese: だからなんで　温泉に銃を持ち込むのさ！
English: Why do you keep taking a bath with a gun!?

Japanese: きゃっ　ルカくん怖い
English: Oh～ How scary～♪ Ruca, protect me!

Japanese: うわ～～ん！　もう勘弁して～～！
English: Waaah! Give me a break!

Japanese: 調子に乗ってんじゃないわよぉ！
English: Don’t get ahead of yourself!

Japanese: だ　誰か助けてぇ～～！
English: Somebody, anybody, save me～～!

Japanese: 女湯の方　えらいことになってんな…
English: Damn, the women’s bath is in chaos...

Japanese:
何故だか　のれんが逆になってたんだもの
当然さ
English:
It seems the signs got reversed
for some reason.

Japanese:
それはさておき
こんなとき　俺たちにできることは１つだ
English: That said, there’s only one thing we men can do.

Japanese:
そうだね　巻き添えを食うのはごめんだ
温泉は後にして部屋に戻ろうか
English:
Indeed, let us not get involved with this
and go back to our room afterwards.

Japanese: だな
English: Right.

Japanese: ドキ！？　イリアの…
English: *Thump*!? Illia’s...

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: イリア
English: Illia

Japanese: アンジュ
English: Ange

Japanese:
イリア　遅いね
仕度できたら　部屋に来るって言ってたのに…
なにかあったのかな？
English:
Illia’s late. She told me that she’d come
to my room when she’s ready, but...
I wonder if something happened?

Japanese: ルカ　お前　ちょっと様子見て来いよ
English: Ruca, go check in on her to see if she’s okay.

Japanese: うん
English: Alright.

Japanese: イリア　いる？　入るよ
English: Illia, are you there? I’m opening the door...

Japanese: え？　バ　バカ！　今　着替えて…！
English: Huh!? Y-You dummy! Don’t--! I’m changing...!

Japanese: ご　ごごごごごごごめんっ！！
English: I-I-I’m s-s-s-s-sorry!
Ruuuuuuuuuucaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!!!!!!!

Japanese:
ごめん　イリア！
み…見るつもりなんてなかったんだ！
本当　ごめん！！
English:
I’m sorry!
I didn’t mean to look!
I’m really sorry!!

Japanese:
ヘンタイ！　最低！　デリカシーなさすぎ！
もう知らない！！
English:
You PERVERT!
You horrible, HORRIBLE PERVERT!
I don’t care anymore!

Japanese: うぅ………

イリア　その辺にしておいたらどう？
ルカくんも悪気はなかったのよね？
English:
Illia, why not leave it at that? Ruca did not 
mean to do it intentionally, right Ruca?

Japanese: も…もちろんだよ！
English: O-Of course I didn’t!

Japanese:
だそうよ
不可抗力だもの　仕方ないわ
English: So he says. It was something inevitable.

Japanese:
うー…　じゃあ　デザートご馳走して
そしたら　許してあげる
English:
Hmm... If you treat me to dessert,
then I might forgive you.

Japanese: 仲立ちした私にもね
English: Please, treat me too as thanks.

Japanese:
わかった
ありがとう　ふたりとも
じゃあ　準備してくるね
English: Okay! Thank you! I’ll go get ready then!

Japanese:
ありがとうなんて…
ホント　お人よしなんだから
English:
“Thank you”...
That guy’s really a softy.

Japanese: でも　それがルカくんのいいところでもあるわ
English: That is one of the things I like about him.

Japanese: まっ　確かに
English: True.

Japanese: ピンクのヒラヒラ
English: Frilly Pink

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: エルマーナ
English: Hermana

Japanese: ふ～～　いいお湯だったぜ
English: Man, that was great...

Japanese: ん…？　なんだ　ありゃ……
English: Hm!? Wh-what’s that?

Japanese:
スパーダ
お風呂でこれ　忘れてったでしょ？
はい
English:
Spada, you forgot this in the bath.
Here.

Japanese:
おう　ありがとな
なぁ　ルカ　アレ　なんだと思う？
English:
Right, thanks. That said... what do you 
think that is, Ruca?

Japanese: 落し物かな？　誰のだろう…
English: Did someone drop it? I wonder who it belongs to...?

Japanese: 待て　拾うな！
English: Wait! Don’t pick it up!

Japanese:
え？　なんで？
落し物なら　落とし主を探さないと…
きっと今頃　困っていると思うよ？
English:
Huh, why? If someone dropped it then we have to
look for its owner, right? I’m sure they’re 
having trouble searching for it.

Japanese:
わかってねェ…
お前はなんも　わかっちゃいねェ
English:
You don’t get it, man.
You don’t get a thing.

Japanese:
いいか　ルカ
落ちているのは　ピンク色のヒラヒラな布だ
English: Listen here, that thing is a “frilly pink” cloth.

Japanese:
しかも　風呂に通じる廊下に落ちている…
ここまで言えば　アレがなんだかわかるな？
English:
And most of all, it fell just right in front of the bath!
It has to be “that”, right?

Japanese: まさか……
English: Ohhhh, “that”...

Japanese: ああ　そのまさかだ
English: Yes, “that”...

Japanese:
手に取ったところをうっかり
女に目撃でもされたら　誤解され
ケダモノと呼ばれる日々が待っている！！
English:
If we just carelessly pick it up and someone happens to
see us, we might get caught in a misunderstanding and
be called a “beast” the rest of our lives!

Japanese: あ…あぶなかったぁ…
English: Phew, that was close...

Japanese: 気づかせてくれて　ありがとう
English: Thanks for warning me, Spada.

Japanese: でも　あのまま放っておいてもいいのかなぁ？
English: But, is it fine if we just leave it there?

Japanese: そこなんだよな…
English: That’s the thing...

Japanese: ルカ・スパーダ
English: Ruca & Spada

Japanese: うーん………
English: Hm...

Japanese:
なんや？　ルカ兄ちゃんに
スパーダ兄ちゃん　なにしてるん？
English: Oh, Ruca Bro, Spada Bro, what’re ya both doin’?

Japanese:
エル！
ちょうどいいところに
あそこに落ちているものなんだけど…
English:
Oh, great timing, Hermie!
Something fell over there...

Japanese:
あ～～～！
こんなところにあったんか～～～！
よかったわ～～！
English:
Oh so that’s where it was!
Thank goodness!

Japanese:
な…なんだ？　エルのだったのか！？
お前　こんなヒラヒラしたものを…！！
English:
That was yours!?
You’re the owner of that frilly pink...?

Japanese:
ちゃうちゃう　これ　ウチのやない
アンジュ姉ちゃんのもんや
まぁ　ウチが借りたんやけど
English:
Nah. It ain’t mine, it’s Sis Ange’s.
Though, Ah am borrowin’ it fer a while.

Japanese:
なんだと…アンジュが……
しかも　借りた…！？
English:
Ohhh it was Ange’s...
Wait, you’re “borrowing” it?!

Japanese: あー…　コホン
English: Ah-- ehem.

Japanese:
エル　モノは相談だが　取引しねェか？
明日　なんかウマいもん　食わせてやる
だから　それをオレに貸してくれ！
English:
Hermie, about that...
Why don’t you lend me that thing for a bit and
I’ll treat you to anything you want tomorrow.

Japanese:
ウマいモンは気になるけど
スパーダ兄ちゃん　持ってへんかった？
English:
Ah’m curious ’bout the food,
but bro, don’ ya have one?

Japanese: なっ！？{fixed}
English: H-Have one!?

Japanese:
も…持ってねェ！
そんなものは持ってねェ！
English:
O-Of course I don’t!
As if I’d have something like that!

Japanese:
おっかしいなぁ
前に使ってたとこ　見た記憶があんねんけど…
English: Weird, Ah thought Ah remembered ya usin’ one earlier.

Japanese:
お…お前…
一体なにを…なにを…見たんだ…？
English: Wh-what... what the heck did you even see...?

Japanese:
前に鼻かんどったやろ？
そのとき　ハンカチ使うてへんかった？
English:
Ya were usin’ it on yer nose, right?
Weren’t ya usin’ a handkerchief that time?

Japanese:
ハ…ハンカチ…？
ってことは…その手に持っているのは…
English:
A h-handkerchief...?
So that thing is...?

Japanese:
せや　風呂に行く途中　鼻がムズムズしてなぁ
アンジュ姉ちゃんに　ハンカチ借りたんや
English:
Right. Mah nose turned all runny from
the bath, so Sis Ange let me use one.

Japanese:
ハ…ハンカチ…
……なんだ…ハンカチか…
そうか……
English:
Oh... a handkerchief...
It was a handkerchief...
Sigh...

Japanese: スパーダ兄ちゃん　どうしたん…？
English: What’s wrong?

Japanese: 今は　そっとしておいてあげて
English: I think it’s for the best if we give him some space...

Japanese:
それよりもエル　早くアンジュに
返しに行ったほうが　いいんじゃないかな？
English:
That said, I think you should hurry
and get that back to Ange.

Japanese: せやな　兄ちゃんたち　ありがとうな～！
English: Oh, right! Thanks!

Japanese: スパーダ　元気だして…
English: Cheer up, Spada...
Sigh...

Japanese: どっきり混浴タイム１
English: Mixed-Bath Time 1

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese:
うひゃひゃひゃひゃ
ついにこの時が来たぜェ！
English: Wahahaha! It’s about time!

Japanese: この時間帯は　温泉が混浴と来たもんだ！
English:
Now’s the time when the hot springs
are open for mixed-bathing!

Japanese:
これはもう行くっきゃねェ！
うひゃひゃひゃひゃ
English: I’ve got to go now! Wahahahaha!

Japanese: うへェ…白くてよく見えねェな…
English: Whoa, it’s so white that I can barely see anything!

Japanese:
おっ　湯気が消えてきたぞ
どれどれ……
English: Oh! The steam’s disappearing!

Japanese: って　誰もいねェ……
English: ...No one’s there.

Japanese: ま　混浴なんてそんなもんか…クソッ…
English: So much for mixed-baths...

Japanese: どっきり混浴タイム２
English: Mixed-Bath Time 2

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese: やっと混浴の時間になったか
English: Finally, it’s mixed-bath time!

Japanese:
前回はダメだったが　今回こそは！
待っていろ　まだ見ぬ美女たち！
うひゃひゃひゃひゃ
English:
I failed last time, but this time for sure! 
Wait for me, undiscovered beautiful ladies!

Japanese: ち…　白くてよく見えねェな…
English: Tch, it’s so white that I can barely see anything!

Japanese:
おっ　湯気が消えてきたぞ
どれどれ……
English: Oh! The steam’s disappearing!

Japanese: 乙女アニキ
English: Maiden Aniki

Japanese: あら～ん　かわいいボ・ウ・ヤ
English: Oh my～ What a cute boy～

Japanese:
げっ！？
や　野郎に用はねェんだよ！
English: Tch!? I ain’t interested in you!

Japanese: 乙女アニキ
English: Maiden Aniki

Japanese:
そんなコト言わずに　楽しみましょうよ
そのつもりで来たんでしょ？
English:
Oh, don’t say that～ Let’s have some fun～ 
That’s what you came here for, right?

Japanese:
や　やめろ！！
オレはそっちの趣味はねェーーー！？
English: N-N-No thanks! I don’t swing that way!

Japanese: どっきり混浴タイム３
English: Mixed-Bath Time 3

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese: コンウェイ
English: Kongwei

Japanese:
前回は散々な目にあっちまったが
今日こそは　美女がいるような気がする！
English:
Last time was a disaster, but this time I’m
sure there’s gotta be a hottie in there!

Japanese:
さてと　混浴の時間になったな
うひゃひゃひゃひゃ！　行くぜ！
English:
Now that it’s mixed-bath time! 
Wahahahaha! Let’s go!

Japanese: 相変わらず　白くてよく見えねェな…
English: As always, its so white I can’t see anything...

Japanese:
おっ　湯気が消えてきたぞ
どれどれ……
English: Oh! The steam’s disappearing!

Japanese: {fixed}（お？　あの後姿は……ビンゴだ！）
English: (*gasp* That back... BINGO!)

Japanese: お嬢さん！　オレと一緒に一風呂どうだ？
English: Hi, Miss! Want to take a bath with me?

Japanese:
……お嬢さん？
誰のことを言ってるんだい？
English: Who are you calling “Miss?”

Japanese: い　いや…その…
English: Uhhh... no... uh...

Japanese:
この場にはボクとキミしかいない
ボクのどこがお嬢さんだって？
English:
We are the only ones here. 
Now, in what way am I a “miss?”

Japanese: 言いたいことがあるなら　ハッキリ言えよ
English:
If you have something to say, 
you better say it properly.

Japanese:
な　なんでもねェよ！
オレはもう上がるぜ！
English: N-Nothing! I’m going!

Japanese: ……まったく
English: Goodness gracious...

Japanese: どっきり混浴タイム４
English: Mixed-Bath Time 4

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese: リカルド
English: Ricardo

Japanese:
コンウェイは部屋でルカと一緒に読書
おっさんは外出
アンジュたちはティータイム中…
English:
Kongwei’s in his room and Ruca’s reading books
with him. The old man’s outside, and Ange and 
the others are currently having teatime.

Japanese:
これで　あの悲劇は
繰り返されずに済みそうだな
English:
With this, I’m sure that tragedy
won’t repeat itself ever again!

Japanese: 少し遅くなっちまったが　まだ混浴の時間帯だ
English:
I’m a bit late but the bath should
still be open for mixed-bathing.

Japanese:
今日こそは　行くぜ！
うひゃひゃひゃひゃ！
English: This time for sure! Let’s go! Wahahahaaha!

Japanese: く…やっぱり　白くてよく見えねェな…
English: Tch, of course it’s still white.

Japanese:
おっ　湯気が消えてきたぞ
どれどれ……
English: Oh! The steam’s disappearing!

Japanese:
{fixed}（おぉ！？　あの黒髪ロングヘアは…！
　ビンゴだっ！　頑張った甲斐があったぜ！）
English:
(Oh! A lady with long black hair! 
Enduring through all that stuff was worth it!)

Japanese: お姉さん！　オレと一緒に一風呂どうだ？
English: Hi, Miss! Why don’t we take a bath together?

Japanese: あ…な…なっ……
English: Oh... ah... why...

Japanese:
……最近　この時間帯に　誰かれ構わず
ナンパしているヤツがいると聞いたが
English:
I’ve heard that someone’s been carelessly hitting
on people recently but...

Japanese: まさかスパーダだったとはな
English: To think that it was you...

Japanese:
期待に添えなくて悪いが
俺には　そういう趣味は一切ない
English:
I’m sorry to disappoint you, 
but I don’t swing that way!

Japanese:
違ェよ！　なにボケてんだよ！
オレだって　そういう趣味はねェよ！
English: You’re wrong! I don’t swing that way either!

Japanese: ただちょっと　運が悪かっただけだ…！
English: It’s just that my luck’s been bad recently...!

Japanese:
そういえば　お姉さんと声をかけていたな
なるほど　女目当てで混浴か
English:
Now that you mention it, you were hitting 
on a woman... So that was your intention.

Japanese: ああ　そうだ　悪いか？
English: Yeah, what of it?

Japanese:
咎めるつもりはないが
１つ良いことを教えてやろう
English:
I don’t mean to rebuke you, but 
let me tell you one thing...

Japanese:
もう少し　早く来れば
かなりの美女が居たというのに
勿体無いことをしたな
English:
If you arrived a little earlier, you would’ve
met a really beautiful lady. Shame...

Japanese: では　先に上がらせてもらう
English: Well, I’m getting out first.

Japanese: ってことは　あのおっさん…
English: Then that means that old man...

Japanese: くっそっ～～～！！
English: DAMN IT!

Japanese: 傭兵だからな
English: Because I’m a Mercenary

Japanese: リカルド
English: Ricardo

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese:
ふぃ～～　やっぱ温泉はいいぜ
なぁ　ルカ
English: Hot springs really are nice... right, Ruca?
Right...?

Japanese:
お前　なんでそんな端っこにいんだ？
風呂は広いんだしよ
もっとこっち来りゃいいじゃねェか
English:
That said, why are you at the edge anyway?
This bath’s big and all, why don’t you come 
over here?

Japanese:
う　うん…
でも　なんだか恥ずかしくて…
English: O-Okay but... I’m kind of embarrassed...

Japanese:
誰かと一緒にお風呂に入るなんて
あんまりしたことがないから…
English: I’m not really used to bathing with someone else...

Japanese: ふーん…　まっ　いいけどよ
English: Ohhh, I see now...

Japanese:
そうだ　ルカくん
折角だから　ルカくんには
温泉の入り方を伝授してあげよう！
English: Well, since you’re here and all, let me initiate you!

Japanese:
なに　スパーダ
なんか　変だけど………うわっ！？
English: Spada...? You’re acting a bit str-- whoa!

Japanese:
ヒャハハハハハ！
スキだらけだぜ　ルカ！
English: You’re wide open! Hahaha! Got you, Ruca!

Japanese: うぅ…　鼻に水が…入った…
English: Ugh... Water got in... my nose...

Japanese:
なぁに言ってんだ
これが　裸の付き合いってモンだろ？
English:
What the heck are you saying? Isn’t this what
we call “skinship?”

Japanese:
そうかなぁ？
なにか違う気がするんだけど…
English: Is it...? It kinda feels different though...

Japanese:
なにをしているんだ
他の客に迷惑だ　静かにしろ
English: You’re bothering other visitors, be quiet!

Japanese:
へへっ　残念だけどよ　おっさん
今日はオレたち以外　いないようだぜ？
English:
Sorry to break it to you, but we’re 
the only ones here, old man!

Japanese:
楽しく入るのも構わんが
あいにくと俺は静かに入りたいものでな
English:
Having fun is nice and all, but I’d
rather bathe in peace.

Japanese: ンだよ　カタイこと言うなって
English: What the heck? Don’t be so stiff!

Japanese: おっさんも……それ！！
English: Take that!

Japanese: ふ…　甘いな…
English: Hah. Weak...

Japanese: おっさんこそ　甘いぜ！
English: I should tell you that, myself!

Japanese: なにっ！？
タ　タオルが…！！
English: H-His towel...!!

Japanese: よし…！
English: HAH...!

Japanese: ………な　なんだと…水着…！？
English: Wait... what the heck...!? That getup...!

Japanese: 黒ビキニ……
English: Black speedo...

Japanese:
こんなこともあろうかと
準備をしておいて正解だったな
English: I was right to prepare for such a situation...

Japanese: 準備って……
English: “Preparing”...?

Japanese:
当然だ　傭兵ならば
どんな事態にも備えておくものだからな
では　俺は先にあがらせてもらう

くそっ！！
おっさんの方が１枚上手だったか！
English: Damn it! That old man was a step ahead of me!

Japanese: みたいだね…
English: It seems so...

Japanese: それにしても……
English: Still...

Japanese: あの水着は…
English: That swimsuit...

Japanese: ルカ・スパーダ
English: Ruca & Spada

Japanese:
ないね…
ないな…
English:
No way...
Yeah... no.

Japanese: 大部屋の不安
English: Anxiety About Large Rooms

Japanese: リカルド
English: Ricardo

Japanese: エルマーナ
English: Hermana

Japanese: なんや　今日　大部屋なん？
English: Ohhh, we got a large room today!

Japanese: 例に漏れず　満室だそうだ
English: Room’s full, as usual.

Japanese: 困ったなぁ　ウチどうしたらええの？
English: Oh man... what’re we supposed ta do?

Japanese: なにか気になることでもあるのか？
English: What’s bothering you?

Japanese:
え～　リカルドのおっちゃん
こんなピッチピチのかわいい乙女に
そんなこと聞くん？　野暮やなぁ
English:
Oh, Uncle, what’re ya doin’ askin’ a 
cute an’ youthful girl such a thing?

Japanese: なら　口に出して言うな
English: What are you yakking about?

Japanese:
そこまで聞いたんやったら
最後まで聞いたって～な
English: Ah said what Ah said.

Japanese:
ウチ　これでも　おっちゃんに
夜這いされへんか　心配なんやで？
English:
Ah’m worried ’bout ya, sneakin’
bout at night an’ creepin’ on me.

Japanese:
安心しろ　そういう趣味はない
バカなことを言っていないで
ガキはさっさと寝ろ
English:
Rest assured, I don’t have such inclinations. 
Now stop saying stupid things and go to sleep.

Japanese:
冗談やで　おっちゃん
ほな　おやすみ～
English: Ah’m jus’ kiddin’, Uncle. G’night!

Japanese: 黙っていれば　かわいいものを…
English: She’d be cute if she kept that mouth shut...

Japanese:
しかし　自分で気づくには
まだまだ時間がかかりそうだな
English:
But I think it’s going to take a while for
her to realize that.

Japanese: 世界中の食べ物
English: Food from around the world

Japanese: コーダ
English: Coda

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: アンジュ
English: Ange

Japanese: リカルド
English: Ricardo

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese: エルマーナ
English: Hermana

Japanese: イリア
English: Illia

Japanese: キュキュ
English: QQ

Japanese: コンウェイ
English: Kongwei

Japanese:
ぬふぬふ
食べ物がいっぱいなんだな　しかし
English: Yumyum! There’s a lot of food though.

Japanese:
こうしてみると　世界各地には
色々な食べ物があるんだね
English:
Come to think of it, every place we’ve visited
has their own unique cuisines.

Japanese:
こんなにたくさんの食べ物に囲まれるなんて
コーダは幸せだ　ルカはどうだ～？
English:
To think that we’re surrounded by so much wonderful
food. Coda is happy. Is Ruca happy too?

Japanese:
僕も幸せかな？
空腹だと　動けないしね
English:
I guess I am? After all, I can’t fight on an 
empty stomach.

Japanese:
でも　コーダはもっと幸せになりたい
だから　食べるんだな　しかし
English:
But Coda wants to be more more happy. 
That is why Coda will eat, though!

Japanese: うん？　食べるって…
English: Hm? When you say you’ll eat--

Japanese:
うわっ！？
コーダ　勝手に食べちゃダメだよ！
English: Waaah!? Coda, you can’t just eat all our food!

Japanese:
ングング～～
うまいんだな　しかし
English: Nom nom～ It’s delicious though～

Japanese:
イリア　イリア！
大変だよ　コーダが…！！
English: Illia, Illia! It’s terrible! Coda--!!

Japanese:
なによ　ルカ
大きな声出して…って
English: Ruca? What the hell are you screaming about...

Japanese: ゲッ…！？

コーダ　あんた　なに勝手に食べてんのよ！
やめなさいってば！
English:
Coda! You-- Why are you eating everything?!
Hey, STOP IT!

Japanese:
イリア　邪魔するな
コーダは今　幸せを楽しんでいるんだな
English:
Illia, don’t get in my way. Coda is enjoying happiness
right now.

Japanese: 幸せって　あんたねぇ…
English: Happiness...

Japanese:
あんたが全部食べちゃったら
あたしたちが不幸になるの！
English:
Have you ever considered that we won’t
be happy if you ended up eating ALL of our 
food supplies?

Japanese: あら　騒がしいと思ったら…
English: Oh, just when I thought something was going on...

Japanese: コイツ　よく今まで我慢してたな
English: This guy did pretty well restraining himself until now.

Japanese:
たくさんの食べ物を見て
抑えが効かなくなったのだろう
English: Seeing all this food probably weakened his self-control.

Japanese: 誘惑に負けたんだね
English: And finally he yielded to temptation.

Japanese:
あかんで　コーダ
こういうのは　コッソリやらんと
English: Don’ do this now, Coda! Ya hafta do this in secret!

Japanese:
みんなが寝静またときとか
お風呂入てるときとか　安全
English:
When everyone sleeps, or when everyone takes baths.
Then is safe to do this.

Japanese:
お～　そうだな
エルとキュキュは賢いんだな　しかし
English: Oh～ You’re right! Hermie and QQ are so clever though.

Japanese: そこ！　変なコト教えこまないの！
English: Hey! Stop teaching him weird things!

Japanese: イリア　食材だけど…
English: Illia, about the ingredients though...

Japanese: ん～…　ちょっとかじられちゃったけど
English: Hmm... Yeah, they were gnawed on quite a bit.

Japanese: まぁ　大丈夫よね　切って使えばいいし
English: Should be fine if we just cut those parts out.

Japanese:
コーダ　次　勝手に食べたら
当分　ご飯を抜きにするからね～
そこんとこヨロシク♪
English:
Coda, if you do that again, we’re turning you
into emergency food. Got that? ♪

Japanese: アンジュのだっこ
English: Ange’s Hug

Japanese: キュキュ
English: QQ

Japanese: アンジュ
English: Ange

Japanese: イリア
English: Illia

Japanese: エルマーナ
English: Hermana

Japanese: コンウェイ
English: Kongwei

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: リカルド
English: Ricardo

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese: くんくん
English: *sniff sniff*

Japanese: え～っと　キュキュさん？
English: Um... Miss QQ?

Japanese: どうしたの？
English: What’s up?

Japanese: アンジュ　いいにおいする
English: Ange smells good.

Japanese: そうかな？
English: I do?

Japanese:
そうそう　それでな
だっこしてもらうとそのにおいに包まれて
しあわせ～な　気分になんねん
English:
Yeah, yeah! An’ when she hugs ya, ya
jus’ sink in the smell. It feels so good.

Japanese:
そうなのか？
キュキュも　だこ　してもらう！
English: Really? Give QQ a hug!

Japanese: ちょ　ちょっとキュキュさん？
English: W-Wait, Miss QQ!?

Japanese: あたしも試してみよっかな
English: I wanna try it too!

Japanese: え？　イリアまで！？
English: You too, Illia!?

Japanese: ほな　うちも～！
English: Me too!

Japanese: ちょっとま……
English: Wait--!

Japanese:
なんだか女性陣は
盛り上がってるみたいだね
English: It seems the girls have gotten quite lively.

Japanese:
あはは……
僕たちは入っていけそうにないけどね
English: Though, it seems that we can’t really join in.

Japanese: そうだな
English: Right.

Japanese:
いや　でも案外
ノリでいけるかもしれねェぜ？
English: No, but I think I can get away with it, ya know?

Japanese: やめておけ
English: Don’t even think about it.

Japanese: 勉強するキュキュ
English: QQ Studying

Japanese: アンジュ
English: Ange

Japanese: キュキュ
English: QQ

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese:
そうか　わかた！
アンジュ　ありがと！
English:
Oh! QQ finally understand!
Thank you, Ange!

Japanese: どういたしまして
English: You are welcome.

Japanese: あれ？　ふたりとも　なにしてるの？
English: Hm... What are you two doing?

Japanese:
キュキュ　アンジュに聞いた
この世界のこと　言葉　文化　少しわかた
English:
QQ asked Ange about this world.
QQ understands a bit.

Japanese:
へぇ　勉強してたんだ
えらいね
English:
Ohh, you were studying...
You’re amazing, QQ.

Japanese:
そうか？
キュキュ　えらくない
気になること聞く　当たり前
English:
QQ not amazing.
If QQ curious about something,
she asks.

Japanese:
でも　わからないことを聞くのって
結構　勇気がいるから　えらいと思うよ
English:
But asking about something you don’t know
takes some courage. I think that’s amazing.

Japanese:
そうね
聞くは一時の恥　聞かぬは一生の恥
とも言うしね
English:
You are correct. It is only a moment of embarrassment
if you ask, but a lifetime of it if you do not.

Japanese: あぅ…　少し照れる…
English: Yeah... QQ a bit embarassed.

Japanese: それじゃあ　さっきの続きだけど…
English: Now... where were we?

Japanese: はい
English: At...

Japanese:
ふたりとも真剣だなぁ
特にキュキュさん
僕も彼女を　見習わないとな
English:
Those two are so earnest, especially QQ.
I’ll try my best too.

Japanese: 欲望の塊
English: Personification of Greed

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: キュキュ
English: QQ

Japanese: コーダ
English: Coda

Japanese:
ルカ
キュキュ　質問ある
いいか？
English: Ruca, can QQ ask question?

Japanese: うん　なにかな？
English: Sure, what is it?

Japanese:
イリア　アンジュ　エル
敵に勝つ
なぜ　目　お金になる？
English:
Why does Illia, Hermie and Ange’s eyes
turn to money when looking at enemies?

Japanese: そ…　それはまたすごい質問だね…
English: That’s... quite a dreadful question.

Japanese:
すごいか？
キュキュ　すごくない
English: “Dreadful?” QQ not dreadful.

Japanese:
そういう意味の「すごい」じゃなくて
鋭い質問だねってことだよ
English:
Oh, I didn’t mean that...
I meant that you asked
quite an observant question.

Japanese:
そうだたか
言葉　難しい…
English:
Is that so?
Words hard...

Japanese:
焦らずに　ゆっくりならしていけばいいよ
わからないことがあったら　いつでも聞いてね
English:
It’s fine to take it slow. So if you have
any questions, don’t hesitate to ask.

Japanese: ルカ…　ありがと！
English: Ruca, thank you!

Japanese: あぅ…　ルカ避ける　ダメ
English: Aww... Ruca avoid bad.

Japanese: 君が嬉しいのは　伝わったから大丈夫だよ
English: I’m fine, I can tell you’re happy.

Japanese: そか…
English: Oh...

Japanese:
え…えっと…
少しくらいなら…いいよ…？
English: Uhh... just for a bit.

Japanese: やた！
English: Yay!

Japanese: うわぁ！
English: Whoa!

Japanese: ルカ　だいじょうぶか！
English: Ruca, you alright?

Japanese: う…うーん…　なんとか…
English: Y-Yeah, somehow...

Japanese: ごめん…　ルカ…
English: Sorry, Ruca...

Japanese:
ううん　平気だから気にしないで
それじゃあ　僕は行くね
English:
It’s alright, I’m okay.
I’ll be going now.

Japanese: あぅ　質問の答え　聞く　忘れた
English: Oh QQ forgot to get an answer to the question...

Japanese:
コーダ　質問ある
いいか？
English: Can QQ ask Coda?

Japanese: おー　なんでも答えるぞ　しかし
English: Okay! Coda will answer your question!

Japanese:
イリア　アンジュ　エル
敵に勝つ
なぜ　目　お金になる？
English:
Why does Illia, Hermie and Ange’s eyes
turn to money when looking at enemies?

Japanese: それは　ガメツイからなんだな
English: That’s because they’re all stingy!

Japanese: が…めつい…？
English: Stingy...?

Japanese:
ぬふっ！？
いい匂いなんだな　しかし！
English: Oh! That smells tasty though!

Japanese: がめつい　がめつい…？
English: Stingy... stingy?

Japanese: なにかわからん…
English: I don’t know what that is...

Japanese: ハンモック１
English: Hammock 1

Japanese: キュキュ
English: QQ

Japanese: コーダ
English: Coda

Japanese: エルマーナ
English: Hermana

Japanese: スパーダ
English: Spada

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

Japanese: リカルド
English: Ricardo

Japanese: アンジュ
English: Ange

Japanese: イリア
English: Illia

Japanese: コンウェイ
English: Kongwei

Japanese:
ハンモックで寝るなんて
ガルポスの文化は　変わってるのね
English:
Galpos’ culture is quite unique,
making us sleep in a hammock.

Japanese: ああ　だけどよ　なんかワクワクしねェか？
English: Isn’t it exciting, though?

Japanese: うん！　冒険みたいで楽しいよね！
English: Yeah! It’s like an adventure!

Japanese:
面白いっちゅーのは　わかるんやけど
これで　本当に眠れるん？
途中で落っこちたりせぇへん？
English:
Ah know it’s interestin’ an’ all,
but what if ya fell while sleepin’?

Japanese:
なにこれ！
揺れる　揺れる！
English:
Whoa! What is this?
It’s wobbly! Wobbly!

Japanese:
おお～～！
すごいぞ　キュキュ！
エルも乗ってみるんだな　しかし
English:
Whoa! That’s amazing, QQ!
You should try and ride it too though, Hermie!

Japanese:
わっ　わっ！　揺れるなぁ
イリア姉ちゃん　これ　大丈夫なん？
アンジュ姉ちゃんみたいに　めっさ揺れるで
English:
Whoa! It’s really wobblin’!
Sis Ange, are we really gonna
be a’ight on this?

Japanese: エ　エル…！
English: H-Hermie!

Japanese: イヤな予感しかしないけど　乗ってみるか…
English: I don’t have a good feeling about this, but why not...

Japanese:
なにこれ　思ったより快適
いいカンジじゃない～～～♪
English:
Whoa, nice!
It’s more comfortable than I imagined～

Japanese: イリア　あんまり揺らすと酔うわ
English:
Illia, do not swing it too much 
or else you might get sick.

Japanese: 大丈夫　大丈夫！
English: I’m fine, see!

Japanese: では　そろそろ寝るとするか
English: Then, let’s go to sleep.

Japanese: イリア…？
English: Illia?

Japanese: …………ぎ…ぎ…ぼぢ…わ{fixed}゛{variable}る{fixed}゛{variable}い{fixed}゛…
English: I... I feel... sick...

Japanese: えぇっ！？　だ　大丈夫！？
English: Huh!? A-Are you okay?

Japanese: あんなに揺らしていたんだし当然だよ
English:
It is only natural, since she kept
swinging like a hyperactive child.

Japanese:
イリア姉ちゃん　はしゃぎすぎやで
大丈夫かいな？
吐くんやったら　ついていくで？
English:
Sis Illia, are ya okay?
Ya got too excited.
If ya puke Ah feel like Ah might too, hear?

Japanese:
い{fixed}゛{variable}い{fixed}゛……{variable}だ…だいじょ…ぶ…
向こうで……休ん…でる……
English:
I’m... fine... I’m just... gonna lie there...
for... a... bit...

Japanese: 自業自得だな
English: You got what you deserved.

Japanese: ハンモック２
English: Hammock 2

Japanese: アンジュ
English: Ange

Japanese: エルマーナ
English: Hermana

Japanese: イリア
English: Illia

Japanese: キュキュ
English: QQ

Japanese: もう遅いし　そろそろ眠りましょう
English: It is late, we should stop and rest a while.

Japanese:
せやなぁ　今日もぎょうさん動いたし
ゆっくり休みたいわ
English:
True. We ended up movin’ a lot, so Ah
wanna take mah time an’ rest fer a bit.

Japanese: うげっ…
English: Ugh...

Japanese:
そういえば　この宿
ベッドじゃなくて　ハンモックだった…
English: I forgot that this inn had hammocks and not beds.

Japanese:
せやな　この前来たとき
イリア姉ちゃん　ハンモック揺らしまくって
気持ち悪くなってたなぁ
English:
Oh yeah, last time we were here Sis Illia
swung on the hammock too much an’
ended up gettin’ sick.

Japanese: 今回はそんなことしないようにね
English: Make sure not to do it again, Illia.

Japanese:
わかってるわよ～
あたしだって　もうあんな思いはイヤだし
English:
I got it, okay.
I don’t want to feel that way again.

Japanese: それじゃあ　おやすみなさい
English: Well, then, good night.
Hnnn...

Japanese: うぎゃっ！！
English: Gya!!

Japanese: 痛たたたた…
English: Oww...

Japanese:
……あ～～～も～～～～

To hell with this!
I hate this piece of--

だいじょぶか？

That’s third time Illia fell.

English:
We should prepare something for Illia

Japanese: せやな
English: Right.

Japanese: イリア
English: Illia

Japanese: エルマーナ
English: Hermana

Japanese: アンジュ
English: Ange

Japanese: キュキュ

English:
Hey, Ah’ve been wonderin’ fer a while now,

でも　エル

Japanese:

Hey, Spada, why are you looking around?

English: Ruca, Galpos is a resort spot, right?

I wonder if it’s because we’re in the residential area?

English: So what does that have to do with this...?

このご時世だし　ここに観光に来る人たちって

Well, I think most of the tourists here

だったら　みんな　別荘やプライベートビーチを

English:
So, I assume everyone would just have private villas

Japanese: クソッ…！　そういうことか…！！
English: Damn! So that’s why...

If that’s the case Ruca, follow me!

Sis Ange, is it fine if we let Spada Bro an’ Ruca Bro

However

English:
Ange, just say that it’s embarassing hearing those two

Japanese: ルカもスパーダについてっちゃって…フンだ！
English: And even Ruca went with Spada! Grrr...!

If that’s the case why don’tcha put on a swimsuit an’

Japanese: イリア
English: Illia

Japanese:

欲におぼれるとは…これだからガキは…

These brats just give in to their desires 
easily. That’s why they’re...

That said, isn’t it kind of hot? I’m gonna go

Japanese: それなら僕も　涼しい日陰でくつろごうかな

English: Stingy?

English: QQ

English: Ricardo

どうやら一度

English: QQ

As excessive as ever... I want something crispy today,

簡単なことだ
各自　勝手に食べて朝までに宿に戻る

Great idea!

なぁ　ルカ兄ちゃん

みんなで食べに行くんやなくて　最初から

Shouldn’t we jus’ have eaten outside

Yep. It’s amazing how early they

English:
On that note, I believe their creed

Japanese: ルカ
English: Ruca

アンジュ姉ちゃん
その{fixed}『{variable}あさいち』って　そんなにすごいん？

Sis Ange, is this “mowing market”

ええ
色々なものが　とても安く買えると

English:

だ　大丈夫なの？
